channel.title: Oldenburg International Film Festival on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Oldenburg International Film Festival on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Keep Quiet’ Review: A Stellar Lou Diamond Phillips Helps Police Procedural Transcend Genre Clichés
item.description: A tribal cop breaks in a new partner while dealing with the return of a recently released criminal in Vincent Grashaw’s thriller being showcased at Oldenburg.

item.title: ‘Keep Quiet’ Review: A Stellar Lou Diamond Phillips Helps Police Procedural Transcend Genre Clichés
item.description: A tribal cop breaks in a new partner while dealing with the return of a recently released criminal in Vincent Grashaw’s thriller being showcased at Oldenburg.

item.title: Scott Glenn on Gene Hackman, Saving Coppola’s Life and Still Having “Gas Left in the Tank”
item.description: The character actor’s character actor plays a rare leading role in ‘Eugene the Machine,’ which is opening the 2025 Oldenburg Film Festival.

item.title: Scott Glenn on Gene Hackman, Saving Coppola’s Life and Still Having “Gas Left in the Tank”
item.description: The character actor’s character actor plays a rare leading role in ‘Eugene the Machine,’ which is opening the 2025 Oldenburg Film Festival.

item.title: ‘Eugene the Marine’ Review: Scott Glenn Is Riveting in an Old-School Horror Film That’s Not on His Level
item.description: The veteran actor plays an elderly man caught up in a series of murders in Hank Bedford’s film premiering at the Oldenburg International Film Festival.
